ygData.subject: Listing of pottery supplies
ygData.msgSnippet: Excuse the lateness of this response, as I get the mailing list in digest form.  :D Dekard asked about a comprehensive list of locations for pottery supplies,
ygData.messageBody:
Excuse the lateness of this response, as I get the mailing list in digest
form. :D

Dekard asked about a comprehensive list of locations for pottery supplies,
and while I can't guarantee it is comprehensive until I have time to explore
every single zone again to verify everything, I've probably got something
close.

http://members.aol.com/niamist/

Wander over to Find Trade Supplies, and then click select pottery. Please,
let me know if you have any corrections of additions to this. Exploration
(and subsequent web page editing) is a huge time eater, and in my impatience
to also play the game, I know I've missed things. :D

~Niami
EQ Traders Corner
